name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A sleek, performance-optimized portfolio website designed to reflect my personal brand and showcase my work.

name: Expense Tracker App
description: A responsive expense and income tracker that helps users manage their finances with ease.

name: Solo Leveling Gamified To-Do App
description: A dark-themed, anime-inspired to-do application based on the Solo Leveling universe, gamifying productivity.

name: The Forgotten Road
description: An atmospheric and emotionally immersive cinematic experience built in Unreal Engine 5, leveraging cutting-edge rendering technologies.

name: Skill Swap
description: A collaborative platform where users can exchange skills, learn from each other, and grow together through real-world practice and networking, without any money.

name: Business Defaulters
description: A web application that allows users to verify GST registration, check business credibility, and assess risk before engaging with any Indian business.

name: Gyan Bot
description: A Telegram-based academic assistant that delivers university PDFs and study resources for CHARUSAT students. Built with Node.js and webhook integrations, the bot automates document access and provides a streamlined academic support experience. Deployed on Vercel for fast performance and reliable availability.

name: Coin Collector
description: A casual 2D arcade-style game developed using the Godot Engine where players collect coins while navigating obstacles and challenges. The game focuses on responsive controls, simple mechanics, and progressively engaging gameplay, showcasing fundamental game design, level logic, and player interaction systems.

name: GitCraft Server
description: A backend server project designed to manage and support a multiplayer Minecraft-based environment. The project focuses on server-side logic, networking, player management, and game-state handling, demonstrating backend development principles, real-time interaction, and scalable game server architecture.
